# NWProtocolQUIC.Metadata.KeepAliveBehavior

**Enumeration**

A QUIC connection keepalive behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
enum KeepAliveBehavior
```

## Keepalive Behaviors

- **NWProtocolQUIC.Metadata.KeepAliveBehavior.on**: Keepalives are enabled with the default timeout.
- **NWProtocolQUIC.Metadata.KeepAliveBehavior.off**: Keepalives are disabled.
- **NWProtocolQUIC.Metadata.KeepAliveBehavior.seconds(_:)**: Keepalives are enabled with a custom timeout, in seconds.

## Configuring Keepalives

- **keepAlive**: The QUIC connection keepalive behavior.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: Keepalives are enabled with the default timeout.
